content.raw:
I've been trying to solve this problem for some time now, I've found another model that has a problem, maybe different problem or related I no longer know

here is a screenshot, I've colored each axis with a different color to debug better, this is the `SPL Goal`

![splgoal.png](data/bitbucket.org/repo/r77Gja/images/1999167589-splgoal.png)

I did find nothing in the model that would make the visual of the upper support of the goal to be rotated :confused: 

Would it be okay to merge the feature and ticket an issue with the wrong models since they are a few ?
